unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Chi-Squared Goodness of Fit
question_text: A chi-squared goodness of fit test is used to test:

choices.text: Multiple sample means involving one variable.
Multiple sample means involving two variables.
Multiple sample proportions involving one variable.
Multiple sample proportions involving two variables.

solution:
A chi-squared goodness of fit test is used to test multiple proportions of a single variable.

If a second variable is introduced, then a chi-squared test for homogeneity or independence is appropriate.

Thus, the correct answer is Choice 'C'.
